page.title: 07The Little Chef at Cromwell
page.content: Although this is a quiet rural area, the eastern edge of the block is skirted by the A1 trunk road. Here is found the{Little Chef,}a waitress service restaurant for travellers on the{A1}Northbound. This is one of a chain of over 210 restaurants throughout the British Isles and on average serves about 400 customers per day but this can rise to 800 in summer. This is the{Children's Menu. } (1) Jumbo Crunchy Fish Finger, Baked Beans and Chips.............98p. (2) Griddled Egg, Porkie Sausage and Fried Bread.................88p. (3) Porkie Sausage, Griddled Egg and Chips.......................98p. (4) Beef Burger, Baked Beans and Chips.......................98p. (5) Fried Breast of Chicken, Baked Beans and Chips.............98p.
